text:
No matter who you’re shopping for, finding an affordable gift can pose a serious challenge. Sometimes it’s even hard to know exactly how much you're supposed to spend on a gift, which is where this list of carefully selected gifts under $100 comes in. Just because a gift doesn't cost a pretty penny doesn't mean it has to look like it came from the dollar store. In fact, you may be surprised to see some of these luxury-like gifts don't have a matching luxury price tag.

If you're searching for something that'll please the most important people in your life, these great gifts under $100 have you covered. Featuring some of the latest tech gadgets, trendiest beauty products, coolest subscription services, best personalized accessories, and more, this is the ultimate affordable gift-giving guide for virtually any occasion. Here are our top gift picks that cost less than $100. You can thank us later.
